title: LUX350/LUX-ZEPLIN R&D
abstractText: This proposal will enable the release of short-term bridging funds to Imperial College to support participation in LUX-350 (travel) and R&D/design activities for LUX-ZEPLIN, as determined by the Dark Matter Sub-Group set up by Science Board (document attached).
impactText: Findings from this work are used by the wider scientific community (astrophysics, cosmology, particle physics) and by the media, who report on these topics quite frequently - the search for dark matter attracts significant attention from the public at large. Education Cultural,Societal
